pages.title: Sun Storage Sapling
pages.text: $(byellow)Sun Storage Sapling$() is a kind of sapling that can $(bgreen)storage sun$() for players. Players can $(l)right click$() to eat it and $(bred)absorb its sun$(), and it will $(l)not consume$() after finish eating. Besides, it often used in machine at $()energy input$() slot.

pages.title: Low Storage Sapling
pages.text: Basic storage sapling, its max storage amount is 1000.

pages.title: Storage Sapling
pages.text: Normal storage sapling, its max storage amount is 10000.

pages.title: Storage Sapling
pages.text: Large storage sapling, its max storage amount is 100000.

pages.title: Sun Converter
pages.text: $(byellow)Sun Converter$() can help Storage Saplings absorb sun, you just need to $(l)put saplings into the 9 slots$(), and the Converter will $(bred)automatically absorb nearby sun$() and transfer to saplings.
